plugins\/mybin\/plugin_info\/configurati.Afficher un widget global pour toutes le: Display a global widget for all bins
plugins\/mybin\/plugin_info\/configurati.Eléments à afficher sur le widget global: Elements to display on the global widget

plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Nom de l'équipement My Bin: Name of the My Bin equipment
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Seuil au-delà duquel les notifications s: Threshold at which notifications will be suspended. Keep the field empty for no threshold
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.En automatique, le compteur s'incrémente: When automatic, the counter will be incremented at each collect time or when the command 'ack' is executed. When manual, it will only be incremented when command 'ack' is called.
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Cocher la case pour utiliser le template: Check this option to use widget template
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Pour être notifié le jour même du ramass: To be notified the very day of collect, keep the field empty. Be careful at the time in this case.
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Avec votre configuration, voici les 10 p: With your configuration, here are the next 10 dates of collect:
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Vous pouvez ajouter des expressions cron: You can add cron expressions to manage specific collect frequencies
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Le plugin ne fonctionne que toutes les 5: The plugin works only every 5 minutes. This collect date will be ignored. Change your cron expression.
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Cette date de notification est après la: This notification date is after the collect date. Check your parameters.
plugins\/mybin\/desktop\/php\/mybin.php.Cette expression binaire sera évaluée au: This binary expression will be evaluated at notification's time

plugins\/mybin\/core\/class\/mybin.class.L\\'heure de notification est après l\\': The time of notification is after the time of collect
plugins\/mybin\/core\/class\/mybin.class.Il n\'y a (plus) aucune poubelle à sorti: There's no more bin to put out
plugins\/mybin\/core\/class\/mybin.class.Le seuil doit être un entier positif ou: The threshold must be a positive integer or must be left empty
plugins\/mybin\/core\/class\/mybin.class.Le nombre de jours pour la notification: The number of days for the notification must be a positive integer or 0 or must be left empty
